version_description:
[+] With our new automatic video player, you won’t have to wait for the eye candy. Plus, you can now adjust your video player preferences from your profile.
[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!
[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!

[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!

[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] Now you can like, save, and comment on articles for a more interactive user experience
[+] Improved article and recipe design creates a more refined and uniform aesthetic
[+] With iPhone 6s and 7, experience 3D touch for recipes, articles, and search results
[+] Thanks to a series of small improvements, the app is running more smoothly than ever
[+] Thanks to you, we were able to quickly identify and fix bugs
[+] Find something else worth improving? Send us a note at hello@kitchenstories.de

[+] Thanks to a series of small improvements, the app is running more smoothly than ever
[+] Thanks to you, we were able to quickly identify and fix bugs
[+] Find something else worth improving? Send us a note at hello@kitchenstories.de

[+] Have something to say? You can now like and reply to comments throughout the app.
[+] It's now possible to upload a personalized profile picture to your account.
[+] The app is faster and more powerful than ever, thanks to new performance improvements.
[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de, and we'll get right on it. We look forward to hearing from you!

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!
[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de, and we'll get right on it. We look forward to hearing from you!

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!
[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de, and we'll get right on it. We look forward to hearing from you!

[+] Most-liked comments are now emphasized within our recipes and articles
[+] Your uploaded pictures take center stage and are presented in a better light
[+] Thanks to push notifications, you’ll never miss a reaction to one of your comments

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!
[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] 我们的应用更换了全新的界面，并且可以完美兼容最新的iOS 11
[+] 我们优化了Apple Watch，专注于核心功能：简洁的购物清单
[+] 手机和平板版本中的购物清单也更加清晰、美观
[+] 使用iOS 11的用户可以直接拖拽食谱来整理自己的食谱书
[+] 我们的推送消息更棒了！如果有用户回答你的评论，你将收到及时提醒！
[+] 你有建议或者意见？那就关注我们的微信公众号kitchenstories_来给我们留言吧！

[+] Thanks for your help. With this release we have fixed a lot of bugs according to your requests.

[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] Happy iPhone X Day: Just in time for the launch, the app has been optimized for the new device
[+] Recipes and images are now faster than ever
[+] We have done a bit of cleaning and made things even clearer for you
[+] We have dived deep into the Swift code and fixed the bugs that you told us about so thank you for your help
[+] Have you noticed a problem or simply have a suggestion? Then write to us at hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you

[+] Who seeks, finds: try our new search, helping you find the perfect recipe even faster.
[+] Filters and sorting made easy: get a personal result according to diet, cuisine, or even your favorite ingredient.
[+] Tailored suggestions just for you: Still not sure what to eat today? We have selected our favorite categories - guarenteed to come up with something tasty!
[+] Have another question or suggestion? Just send an e-mail to hello@kitchenstories.de.

[+] Who seeks, finds: try our new search, helping you find the perfect recipe even faster.
[+] Filters and sorting made easy: get a personal result according to diet, cuisine, or even your favorite ingredient.
[+] Tailored suggestions just for you: Still not sure what to eat today? We have selected our favorite categories - guarenteed to come up with something tasty!
[+] Have another question or suggestion? Just send an e-mail to hello@kitchenstories.de.

[+] 2018 will be our year - let’s get started and share your experience with us!
[+] Let the people know: Rate a recipe and leave a comment - in one step.
[+] Searching for a specific dish? Send us your recipe request
[+] Another new year's resolution? We would love to hear: hello@kitchenstories.de

[+] We love your creations! And that's why we give our community picture gallery a little makeover. Double tap to "Like" your favorite photos - give it a try!
[+] Become an author of a cookbook and discover its new beautiful design.
[+] With some small changes here and there everything runs smoothly.
[+] Any questions or wishes? Send us an email: hello@kitchenstories.de.

[+] Thanks to a series of small improvements, the app is running more smoothly than ever
[+] Thanks to you, we were able to quickly identify and fix bugs
[+] Find something else worth improving? Send us a note at hello@kitchenstories.de

[+] Start cooking with us! In cooking mode, we'll guide you through a recipe, step-by-step, while you cook.
[+] Simplified Navigation: no endless scrolling with sticky fingers—tap or swipe to navigate through steps.
[+] Built-In Convenience with he user-friendly integration of a timer and helpful tips ensures a great meal.
[+] Have another question or suggestion? Just send an e-mail to hello@kitchenstories.de.

[+] We knew you were clever. With your keen eye, you helped us quickly discover and resolve bugs. From here on out, it’s smooth sailing!

[+] Discovered another bug? Then give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

[+] 11.1.1 is your lucky number. We fixed an issue regarding shopping list synchronization to the Apple Watch. Happy shopping...and cooking!
[+] Discovered a bug? Give a shout to hello@kitchenstories.de. We’re always happy to hear from you.
We are constantly updating Kitchen Stories - to create new features and add reliability - so every cooking experience is a great one!

[+] We’re thrilled to support all the great new features of iOS 12 including Siri Shortcuts!

[+] Upload your recipes to the app and join our community of home cooks from around the world.

[+] Show us how it's done by uploading instructional videos to your recipe steps.

[+] Have a suggestion? Write to us at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

[+] Update your profile with a bio, your birthday, and more!

[+] Kitchen Stories presents a brand new look! From our logo and app icon, to colors and designs, we’re excited to debut an updated style.

[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

[+] Discover Kitchen Stories now in dark mode!

[+] Sign up effortlessly with your Apple ID.

[+] Access your favorite recipes via Siri shortcuts.

[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

Get excited! This update features our handy new feature cookbook+

[+] Collect your favorite recipes from the web and save them to your Kitchen Stories cookbook collections
[+] Use our easy-to-follow 'cooking-mode' interface
[+] Find all your recipes in one neat place and access them across all your devices
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

Get excited! This update features our handy new widgets exclusively for iOS 14
[+] Get inspired by our daily changing "Recipe of the Day" widget directly on your home screen
[+] Add the "My Cookbooks" widget to your home screen to have your favorite Kitchen Stories cookbooks easily accesible
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

[+] Search in a new way: Easily distinguish between and search for recipes from Kitchen Stories, the community, and around the web!
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

The new era of smart kitchens at Kitchen Stories!
[+] Connect your Home Connect account* via your Kitchen Stories app to start your streamlined smart kitchen experience
[+] Easily control your Home Connect oven during any baking steps

*Only compatible within the EU and UK

[+] Improved product placements
[+] General bug fixes and improvements
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

New with iOS 15
[+] Extra-large widgets for your tablet for even more daily cooking inspiration!
[+] Direct integration with Apple Notes
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!

New with iOS 15
[+] Extra-large widgets for your tablet for even more daily cooking inspiration!
[+] Direct integration with Quick Notes on iPad
[+] Have a suggestion? Give us a shout at hello@kitchenstories.de. We'd love to hear from you!
